tag_list: humanity-knowledge, commercialization, commericialisation, understanding-people, seo, serp, sem, sales, online-marketing
overview:
Tim’s background is in service/product creation and business development for companies such as Nokia [in Finland and Australia], Siemens, DMR and Unisys as well as in start-ups and early-phase to growth-phase companies, directly or as an external advisor to grow their markets. He has achieved breakthrough sales and assisted companies to secure a strong growth path [250k to 2m]

Focus on this approach has brought in results for both corporate and small to medium sized businesses across various geographies, as well as within a variety of industries: Internet, retail, finance, NFP associations, design, manufacturing, distribution, B2B, government, high technology and telecommunications.

His specialities include Internet strategy and marketing, product creation, SEO, SEPO, communication, consulting, mentoring and coaching, business development, business operations, sustainability planning, international business development, marketing, sales, CRM, network management, OSS, BSS, call recording, call centers, voice, data, VOIP, operations management, billing, IP telephony and cost analysis.

Tim’s passion is in finding solutions that enhance the business not in honing in processes and tools to best suit any and every situation.

Tim was recognized with the Order of the White Rose of Finland, Knighthood 1st class in 2009. [SVR R1]
